title: Text2KGBench Model Comparison
description: Interactive bar chart comparing AI model performance on the Text2KGBench benchmark for ontology-driven text-to-knowledge-graph triple extraction tasks.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: knowledge graphs
benchmarking
natural language processing

large language models
ontology
triple extraction
